actions.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment directs the U.S. Department of Transportation to study methods of inventorying roadside highway safety hardware devices (i.e. guardrails) for the purpose of improving in-service evaluation of these devices.
purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 114-325 to direct the U.S. Department of Transportation to study methods of inventorying roadside highway safety hardware devices (i.e. guardrails) for the purpose of improving in-service evaluation of these devices.
